column5: got some shiners from causeway bait last Friday and i have a little under 2 dozen left. if you are coming through uxbridge to get to scugog pm me and they are yours bring a bait bucket. im just gettn tired of changing the water.
Nice offer agoertzen, if no one claims them empty the water and throw the minnows into a ziploc of salt and put them in the freezer, now you have deadbait for next time

Nice offer agoertzen, if no one claims them empty the water and throw the minnows into a ziploc of salt and put them in the freezer, now you have deadbait for next time Now your talking.They never go to waste .
i did this with my last batch.  they still effective for perch?  or is live better?
i did this with my last batch.  they still effective for perch?  or is live better? They will WORK for perch.... but live is KING always.
They will WORK for perch.... but live is KING always. yup
I got out today for a few hours and went to scugog. wasted my walleye shiners (4"+) on perch no bigger than 6 inchs.
Don't matter, they'll work great, pop em on a genz bug and wiggle.
